title: Code Splitting
subject: React
theory:
## Load Less Code
A single bundle file can get huge (5MB+). Code splitting breaks it into smaller chunks.

### Mechanics
Webpack/Vite supports dynamic `import()`.
When Webpack sees `import('./Modal')`, it creates a separate file `Modal.chunk.js`.

real_world_use_cases.description: Regular users never see the Admin Dashboard. Why user download that code? Split it.

summary: Code splitting ensures users only download code for the page they are currently visiting.
